## Table of Contents

**Classes**

_Public Classes_

* [`lightdm`](#lightdm): Installs and configures LightDM

_Private Classes_

* `lightdm::config`: A private class to configure LightDM
* `lightdm::install`: A private class to install packages for LightDM
* `lightdm::service`: A private class to manage services for LightDM

## Classes

### lightdm

Sets up the LightDM desktop manager. You will (probably?) want xorg and a desktop environment an addition to this.

* **See also**
https://github.com/canonical/lightdm

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include lightdm
```
